content:
InstanceContext Class

Definition

Represents the context information for a service instance.

In this Article

public sealed class InstanceContext : System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject, System.ServiceModel.IExtensibleObject<System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>
Inheritance
Object
System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject
InstanceContext

Constructors

InstanceContext(Object)

Initializes a new instance of the InstanceContext class for a specified object that implements the service instance.

public InstanceContext (object implementation);
implementation
Object

The object that implements the service instance.

Remarks

This sets the service host associated with the instance context to null.

InstanceContext(ServiceHostBase)

Initializes a new instance of the InstanceContext class for a service hosted by a specified host.

public InstanceContext (System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase host);
host
ServiceHostBase

The ServiceHostBase that hosts the service.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

host is null.

InstanceContext(ServiceHostBase,Object)

Initializes a new instance of the InstanceContext class for a specified object that implements the service instance and is hosted by a specified host.

public InstanceContext (System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase host, object implementation);
host
ServiceHostBase

The ServiceHostBase that hosts the service.

implementation
Object

The object that implements the service instance.

Properties

DefaultCloseTimeout 

protected override TimeSpan DefaultCloseTimeout { get; }
Value
TimeSpan

To be added.

DefaultOpenTimeout 

protected override TimeSpan DefaultOpenTimeout { get; }
Value
TimeSpan

To be added.

Extensions

Gets the extension collection, if any, associated with the service instance.

public System.ServiceModel.IExtensionCollection<System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> Extensions { get; }
Value
IExtensionCollection<InstanceContext>

The stem.ServiceModel.IExtensionCollection`1 of type InstanceContext that contains the instance contexts for the extensions of the service instance.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The service instance associated with this context is closed, but was not aborted.

CommunicationObjectFaultedException

The service instance associated with this context is in a faulted state.

Host

Gets the host for the service instance.

public System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase Host { get; }
Value
ServiceHostBase

The ServiceHostBase that hosts the service instance.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The service instance associated with this context is closed, but was not aborted.

CommunicationObjectFaultedException

The service instance associated with this context is in a faulted state.

IncomingChannels

Gets the sessionful channels that are incoming to the service instance.

public System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel> IncomingChannels { get; }
Value
ICollection<IChannel>

The stem.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1 of type IChannel that contains the sessionful channels incoming to the service instance.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The service instance is closed and cannot be used.

CommunicationObjectFaultedException

The service instance is in a faulted state.

ManualFlowControlLimit

Gets or sets a limit on the number of messages that can be processed by the instance context.

public int ManualFlowControlLimit { get; set; }
Value
Int32

The number of messages that can be processed by the instance context.

Remarks

When the ManualFlowControlLimit value reaches zero no more messages can be processed.

OutgoingChannels

Gets the sessionful channels that are outgoing from the service instance.

public System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel> OutgoingChannels { get; }
Value
ICollection<IChannel>

The stem.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1 of type IChannel that contains the sessionful channels outgoing from the service instance.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The service instance is closed and cannot be used.

CommunicationObjectFaultedException

The service instance is in a faulted state.

SynchronizationContext

Gets or sets the context used for thread synchronization with the current instance context.

public System.Threading.SynchronizationContext SynchronizationContext { get; set; }
Value
SynchronizationContext

The SynchronizationContext used for thread synchronization with the current instance context.

Exceptions
InvalidOperationException

The communication object is opened or closing and cannot be modified in these states.

CommunicationObjectAbortedException

The communication object has been aborted and cannot be modified in these states.

ObjectDisposedException

The communication object has been closed already and cannot be modified in these states.

CommunicationObjectFaultedException

The communication object is faulted and cannot be modified in these states.

Methods

GetServiceInstance()

Returns the instance of the service for the instance context.

public object GetServiceInstance ();
Returns
Object

The object that represents the service instance.

Exceptions
InvalidOperationException

The service instance is in a created or opening state or is not initialized.

CommunicationObjectAbortedException

The service instance is aborted.

ObjectDisposedException

The service instance has been closed already and cannot be modified in these states.

CommunicationObjectFaultedException

The service instance is faulted and cannot be modified in these states.

GetServiceInstance(Message)

Returns the instance of the service for the instance context in response to an incoming message.

public object GetServiceInstance (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message);
message
Message

The incoming message that triggered the creation of a service object.

Returns
Object

The object that represents the service instance.

Exceptions
InvalidOperationException

The service instance is in a created or opening state or is not initialized.

CommunicationObjectAbortedException

The service instance is aborted.

ObjectDisposedException

The service instance has been closed already and cannot be modified in these states.

CommunicationObjectFaultedException

The service instance is faulted and cannot be modified in these states.

Remarks

The general idea is that you only create an instance of the service when a message directed at it arrives, by calling Open; then if no message arrives, no InstanceContext is created and no service object is created, and so resources are not deployed until actually required.

IncrementManualFlowControlLimit(Int32)

Increases the number of messages that can be processed by the service instance.

public int IncrementManualFlowControlLimit (int incrementBy);
incrementBy
Int32

The additional number of messages that can be processed by the service instance.

Returns
Int32

The new limit on the number of messages, after incrementBy is added, that can be processed by the service instance.

Releases the service instance.

public void ReleaseServiceInstance ();
Exceptions
InvalidOperationException

The service instance is in a created or opening state and cannot be used.

CommunicationObjectAbortedException

The service instance has been aborted.

ObjectDisposedException

The service instance is closing or has been closed already and cannot be modified.

CommunicationObjectFaultedException

The service instance is faulted and cannot be modified in these states.
